title: Please fix
body: Im in promos for gold 4 and the client keeps crashing. giving me loss on my promos. i think its dumb how crashes count as a dodge. please fix this. People doesnt deserve to get stressed cause your client isnt working properly

replies.body:
An unstable connection to the game servers is generally the cause of crashes in champ select. The root cause can be poor ISP routing to the server or problematic local network settings. I recommend starting out by working through our [connection guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) to see if any local settings were conflicting with League.

Let me know if those steps caused any change.

While it sucks, at this point I recommend just going for your promos again. If you deserve Gold 4, you'll be able to get there again and climb on up. If you experience frequent client crashes at important moments, I'd recommend re-installing League and seeing if that fixes the problem.
